page.title: 08Free Time At Birnie.
page.content: I have recently moved to the Birnie area_ I have been there for only 3 months. I sometimes get quite lonely up there because there are no cinemas, swimming baths or children my age. But in the summer evenings it is nice and quiet when you can only hear the birds singing. You can have barbeques without people staring at you. Our garden is \ an acre of land so we can play a lot in it. When I go out I play with my sister or my dog. When my friend Deborah comes up we go bicycle runs or take my dog for a walk. I quite often go into Elgin for different activities like Guides and Gymnastics and I also help at brownies. All in all I feel I enjoy living in the country as I can also pop into Elgin in a few minutes.
